channel.title: 667 new rsps (Unamed yet) looking for one other developer
channel.description:
Hello, i'm posting this because I have been having troubles trying to find someone to aid in my quest of owning/hosting a Private server. [size=10pt][b]This will be an economy server[/b][/size]
[b]How this will work-[/b] [i]You will not be "lower in command" to me[/i] -you would be given just as much credit as me. -If either of us make changes to the server we will let each other know (if one of us is offline) -We will both be working on a server that is planned to be hosted on a vps. [b]I've already bought my vps this month[/b]
[b]*REQUIREMENTS*[/b] -You must have general knowledge of 667 source/client -You also need to be active
The plan is to not worry about extra content... I want to focus mainly on base content such as : Home location, Start Location, Respawn Location, ect.. You will be given the same rights as me...meaning me and you will be equal.
Please if anyone is interested comment on here.

item.title: 667 new rsps (Unamed yet) looking for one other developer
item.dc:creator: @tkilla43 tkilla43
item.description:
@tkilla43 wrote:

Hello, i’m posting this because I have been having troubles trying to find someone to aid in my quest of owning/hosting a Private server.
[size=10pt]This will be an economy server[/size]

How this will work-
You will not be “lower in command” to me
-you would be given just as much credit as me.
-If either of us make changes to the server we will let each other know (if one of us is offline)
-We will both be working on a server that is planned to be hosted on a vps. I’ve already bought my vps this month

REQUIREMENTS
-You must have general knowledge of 667 source/client
-You also need to be active

The plan is to not worry about extra content… I want to focus mainly on base content such as : Home location, Start Location, Respawn Location, ect…
You will be given the same rights as me…meaning me and you will be equal.

Please if anyone is interested comment on here.

Read full topic
